text:
Insightly * San Francisco * Full Time * Onsite

Insightly is a leading CRM for small businesses (think Salesforce for small businesses). With over 800,000 customers from 100 countries using the service each day, Insightly is solid, fast growing company, and a fun place to work. Our headquarters are on the water directly across from AT&T Park (Go Giants!)

We're hiring for several engineering roles, including:

* Senior .Net developer

* Senior .Net architect

* SQL DBA

* Lead QA Automation engineer

* .Net Developer (new grad)

For more information visit https://www.insightly.com/about/careers/
